column4: displayName
Process Metadata
description
Parameters relevant for processing methods.
Name of the parameter.
The symbol used to describe this parameter.
The unit or scale of this parameter.
The value of this parameter.
Information about used methods in the data life cycle.
Name of the method as free text.
Name of the scheme used to refer to this method.
Link to the controlled vocabulary.
Link to the specific value of the controlled vocabulary.
List of all parameter names relevant for this method (detailed information about parameters should be given under Method Parameters).
Information about used software.
Name of the software.
Assosicated publication to the software.
Version of the software.
Link to the software, code repository or application.
The licence type of the software.
A representation of a piece of laboratory or field equipment, used in the execution of an experiment, that produces data.
Name of this instrument.
Description of the instrument, e.g., what it is used for.
The type or version of this instrument.
A vendors part number for an instrument or a piece of equipment.
A vendors serial number for an instrument or a piece of equipment.
Required software for this instrument.
Location of the instrument.
Computation environments of the data. Important for numerical simulations or other software code.
Name of the environment.
Name and flags of the used compilers.
Number of compute nodes inside a high performance cluster environment.
Processors per node
Specification of all processing steps in the data life cycle.
Enumeration of all processing steps.
Specifies the position in the data life cycle.
Date this step has been performed.
List of methods used in this processing step (detailed information about methods should be given under Processing Methods).
Method used to measure the errors or uncertainties of this processing step.
List of software names used in this processing step (detailed information about software should be given under Software).
List of instrumental hardware used in this processing step (detailed information about instruments should be given under Instruments).
Name of the environment used for this processing step (detailed information about the environment should be given under Environments).
identifier
